metadata.Title: CVE-2019-7347 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: A Time-of-check Time-of-use (TOCTOU) Race Condition exists in ZoneMinder through 1.32.3 as a session remains active for an authenticated user even after deletion from the users table. This allows a nonexistent user to access and modify records (add/delete Monitors, Users, etc.).

criterions.comment: zoneminder: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
